alert.note: Alert for Craighead; Greene (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 24 at 8:05PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Greene and north central Craighead Counties through 845 PM CDT... At 804 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Lake Frierson State Park, moving north at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Paragould, Bono, Crowleys Ridge State Park, Lake Frierson State Park, Delaplaine, Evening Star, Walcott, Beech Grove, Stonewall, Case, Stanford, Light, Walnut Corner, Finch, Lorado, Herndon, Faulknerville and Crowley`s Ridge State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
